full_summary:
### Tender Notice

#### Solicitation Title: Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency Antenna & Electrical Installation

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids for a construction project at the St-Georges de Beauce, Quebec site, which requires the installation of a Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency Antenna, and Electrical work.

#### Solicitation Number: 2023-35-3296/A
#### Publication Date: 2024-04-18
#### Closing Date and Time: 2024-05-06 2:00 PM EST

#### Description

The RCMP requires construction services for the installation of a Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency Antenna, and Electrical work at the RCMP's St-Georges de Beauce, Quebec site. This is a two-phase competition project, starting with a first phase (Phase one) that involves pre-qualification of bidders based on mandatory requirements. The second phase (Phase two) will invite the pre-qualified bidders to submit a financial bid for the project.

#### Trade Agreements and Sourcing

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses
* Federal Indigenous Business Directory

#### Tendering Procedure

* Open tendering procedure
* The lowest price will be the basis of selection

#### Mandatory Requirements

* Security requirements associated with this ITT
* Mandatory Site Visit included in Phase Two
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### Submittal and Contact Information

Tenders must be submitted via email to Charles.langlois@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. For more information, including contract value and solicitation documents, please refer to the attached ITT.

### Requirements and Specifications

* Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency Antenna, and Electrical work for the RCMP's St-Georges de Beauce, Quebec site
* First phase (Phase one) involves pre-qualification of bidders
* Second phase (Phase two) involves financial bids
* Mandatory site visit required
* Security requirements associated with this ITT

### Feature Summary

* Proximity to site
* Access to labor and equipment
* Previous experience in Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency Antenna, and Electrical work

### Indication of Interest Form

An indication of interest form is not included in this notice. However, vendors are required to review the solicitation document to determine if they are interested in bidding.

### Award Criteria

The lowest price will be the basis of selection.

### Conditions of Work

Vendors
